        update in class PlayerUnit

      • updateExpectingEnemy

        private void updateExpectingEnemy()
        Function for updating the flag indicating if the Unit is currently expecting another enemy one to advance to it / it's Position.
        Note:
        Do NOT reset the Actions here since this can cause the Unit to permanently change from Tank_Mode to Siege_Mode. This is due to the instance being destroyed when morphing from one state to another and therefore instantiating new objects of this Class and the Siege_Mode one.

      • removeOutdatedCombatUnitCounts

        private void removeOutdatedCombatUnitCounts()
        Function for removing all entries from the Queue of stored combat Unit counts that are older than a certain amount of frames.

      • generateNumberOfDestroyedUnitsInInterval

        private int generateNumberOfDestroyedUnitsInInterval()
        Function for counting the number of destroyed Units based on the Queue of stored combat Unit counts.
        Returns:
        the number of Units that got destroyed in the set interval of frames based on the stored combat Unit count Queue.

      • isInSiegeRange

        public boolean isInSiegeRange(bwapi.Unit unit)
        Convenience function.
        Parameters:
        unit - the Unit that is going to be checked if the distance towards it is in the siege range.
        Returns:
        true if the Unit is in siege range, false if not.

        Convenience function.
        Parameters:
        tilePosition - the TilePosition that is going to be checked if it is in the siege range.
        Returns:

      • isInSiegeRange

        public boolean isInSiegeRange(bwapi.Position position)
        Function for checking if a Position is in the PlayerUnitTerran_SiegeTank's siege range. This siege range has a minimum and a maximum distance that any Position must not exceed.
        Parameters:
        position - the Position that is going to be tested.
        Returns:
        true if the Position is in siege range, false if not.

      • isBelowSiegeRange

        public boolean isBelowSiegeRange(bwapi.Unit unit)
        Convenience function.
        Parameters:
        unit - the Unit that is going to be checked if the distance towards it is below the siege range.
        Returns:
        true if the Unit is below the siege range, false if not.

      • isBelowSiegeRange

        public boolean isBelowSiegeRange(bwapi.Position position)
        Function for checking if a Position is below the PlayerUnitTerran_SiegeTank's siege range and therefore too close to attack using the Siege_Mode.
        Parameters:
        position - the Position that is going to be tested.
        Returns:
        true if the Position is below the siege range, false if not.
